about_the_game:
This is the ultimate smithing experience! Our game brings the ancient art of metalworking to life with fun arcade feeling physics-based gameplay. You'll use your own two hands to heat up the metal, shape it on the anvil, and quench it in a bucket of water, just like a real-life blacksmith… But in a charming voxel RPG universe. With every hammer blow and every dip in the water, you'll feel the satisfaction of creating a product for your shop.


As you explore new crafting techniques and unlock new workbenches, you'll discover even more ways to express your creativity and earn more by selling in your shop. So why wait? Start your crafting adventure today and see just how far your imagination can take you!


As you progress in the game, your customers will become more demanding, requiring higher-quality goods and more variety in your inventory. You'll need to stay on top of your crafting game, making sure you have the right items in stock to meet their needs and keep them coming back for more.

And when it comes to pricing your goods, the choice is entirely up to you. You can set your prices high and risk losing customers, or undercut your competitors and attract a larger crowd. But be warned: your customers are savvy and they will try to bargain with you for a better deal. It's up to you to decide whether to hold firm or cut them a deal.


As you gain reputation and level up, you'll unlock new and exciting features and opportunities in the game. From new workbenches to rare resources, higher-level customers to more challenging requests on the shop board, there's always something new to discover and explore.

Leveling up isn't always easy, and you'll need to keep your customers happy and your shop well-stocked in order to maintain your reputation and continue to progress. And with the possibility of leveling down and losing reputation, you'll need to stay on top of your game and be ready for whatever challenges come your way.


From the walls and floors to the lighting and furniture, you'll be able to customize every aspect of your space, creating a unique and welcoming environment for your customers. Whether you're looking to create a cozy and rustic atmosphere or a simple and open vibe, the choice is yours.

And with a wide range of decorations to choose from, including posters, paintings, plants, and more, you'll have endless opportunities to express your personal style and make your shop truly your own.


While it's a bit of a gamble, the rewards can be great. The miner will venture deep into the mines to search for precious metals and gems, while the warrior will brave dangerous beasts to bring back rare and exotic loot.

But be warned: hiring adventurers is not without risk. There's always the chance that they'll run into trouble or fail to bring back the resources you need. It's up to you to weigh the risks and rewards and decide whether it's worth it to invest in these intrepid explorers.


While you won't be able to find the rarest and most valuable resources in the marketplace, you'll still have plenty of options for essential materials like metals, woods, leathers, and more. And with a variety of suppliers and vendors to choose from, you'll be able to shop around for the best prices and quality.


You'll have the opportunity to take on unique and challenging requests from travelers and adventurers seeking one-of-a-kind weapons.

These requests will appear on the shop board in front of your store, offering you the chance to showcase your skills as a master craftsman and take on exciting new projects. But beware: these requests are not for the faint of heart, and will often require rare and hard-to-find materials, as well as advanced crafting techniques.

If you're up for the challenge, completing these requests can bring in substantial rewards and help you build a reputation as a true master of your craft. But be warned: failure to complete a request can damage your reputation and turn potential customers away.

short_description: Craft weapons and armor using fun physics, run your own shop, hire adventurers, level up your reputation, and more. With multiplayer options and endless possibilities, this game is perfect for you whether you are a casual gamer or want to grind out all the possibilities!
